subject: Fix budget calculations to handle large budgets and improve capacity detection
body:
- Add findCapacityInput() helper with case-insensitive keyword matching
- Add calculateCapacityLimit() to dynamically scale search limits based on budget
- Update findMaximumCapacity() to support budgets up to 1M capacity
- Update findBestValue() with adaptive step sizes and dynamic limits (up to 50k)
- Update findConservativeOption() with dynamic limits (up to 25k)
- Fix issue where 10M budget showed "no options" due to hardcoded 10k limit

This resolves the budget calculation issue where large budgets were constrained
by hardcoded capacity limits that were too low.
